title: Rare win for renewable energy: Trump administration funds geothermal network expansion
description: The U.S. Department of Energy approved an $8.6 million grant for Eversource Energy to expand its geothermal network in Framingham, Massachusetts.
content: The U.S. Department of Energy approved an $8.6 million grant for Eversource Energy to expand its geothermal network in Framingham, Massachusetts.
